= Hardware =

As one of the first steps the hardware needs to be documented.

Memory Map (updated, based on [http://spmp8000.wikia.com/wiki/Memory_map 1])

||0x0000.0000 - 0x00f0.0000||RAM||
||0x9800.0000 - 0x9D7F.FFFF||Peripherials||
||0x9D80.0000 - 0x9D80.8000||SRAM (32k)||
||0xFFFF.0000 - 0xFFFF.7FFF||Boot ROM (32k)||

  * Core
  * Clock subsystem
  * Interrupt controller
  * [GPIO]
  * UART
  * I2C and I2C devices
  * I2S and Codec

  * LCD

  * TV encoder
